results.idea: Instant post-news mean-reversion using first-minute move
results.description: Uses news_pct_1min (high coverage, decent user/alpha counts). S1: used single datafield to keep implementation short; S2: N/A (field scalar); S3: not needed (coverage 0.9717 > 0.6); S4: applied (high user/alphaCount). Kept <=2 datafields and <=7 operators per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.72

results.idea: Short-term momentum on 5-minute post-news return
results.description: Uses news_pct_5_min to capture short momentum. S1: single high-signal field; S2: N/A; S3: not applied (coverage 0.774); S4: userCount moderate so acceptable. Followed KEEP_IN_MIND limits. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Volatility breakout: intraday continuation when ATR elevated
results.description: Combines news_atr14 and news_pct_30min to target continuation after volatility shocks. S1: used two fields per suggestion. S2: N/A. S3: not needed (both coverage >0.6). S4: used news_atr14 (high user/alpha). Kept operators minimal. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Volume surge predicts further move: curr_vol vs mov_vol
results.description: Uses news_curr_vol and news_mov_vol to detect abnormal flow. S1: two fields used. S2: N/A. S3: both coverage >0.6 so no backfill. S4: curr_vol userCount lower but mov_vol high; combined to strengthen signal. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Post-news gap fade (open gap reversal)
results.description: Uses news_open_gap (coverage 0.6247) to signal gap fades. S1: single field. S3: borderline coverage ~0.6247 so ts_backfill not required but could be used; I did not backfill to avoid smoothing real gaps. S4: userCount moderate. Kept simple. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Earnings surprise continuation: EPS actual vs first-minute move
results.description: Combines news_eps_actual (high coverage) and news_pct_1min to capture momentum after EPS. S1: applied. S2: N/A. S3: not required. S4: eps_actual high user/alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence: 0.75

results.idea: Oversold after large intraday down move: session low deviation
results.description: Uses news_low_exc_stddev and news_pct_30min for mean-reversion. S1: two fields used. S3: coverages high; no backfill. S4: low_exc_stddev has moderate counts. Confidence set modest because mean-reversion noisy. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Fast reversals when SPY under/overperforms: relative move
results.description: Uses news_indx_perf (direct index-relative) which already subtracts SPY; S1 applied (single field). S3: coverage 0.9713 so stable. S4: moderate userCount. Keeps operators minimal. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Post-news liquidity anomaly: ticks to vwap divergence
results.description: Combines news_tot_ticks and news_eod_vwap to detect liquidity-driven price moves. S1: two fields. S3: both coverage high. S4: tot_ticks has high user/alphaCount. Confidence moderate. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Price impact persistence using after-news 30m return normalized by ATR
results.description: Uses news_pct_30min and news_atr_ratio to normalize move by volatility. S1: two fields. S3: both coverage >0.6. S4: atr_ratio widely used. Confidence: 0.7

results.idea: Rapid mean-reversion when 30-sec spike fades
results.description: Uses news_pct_30sec to capture ultra-short spikes. S1: single field. S3: coverage 0.9673 so stable. S4: moderate userCount. Confidence lower due to microstructure noise. Confidence: 0.5

results.idea: Lagged reaction: 60-minute continuation vs first-minute
results.description: Combines news_pct_1min and news_pct_60min to find continuation/contradiction. S1: two fields. S3: both coverages high. S4: used popular fields. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Volume-adjusted momentum: first 5min return scaled by volume zscore
results.description: Uses news_pct_5_min and news_vol_stddev (vol zscore). S1 applied. S3: both coverage >0.6. S4: vol_stddev has good alphaCount. Confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Post-news directional conviction using minute-to-minute path length
results.description: Uses news_tot_ticks as proxy for path/activity and news_pct_10min for direction. S1: two fields. S3: coverages high. S4: tot_ticks popular. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Gap continuation filtered by PE: cheap stocks continue gap
results.description: Uses news_open_gap and news_pe_ratio. S1 applied. S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: pe_ratio high userCount. Kept simple. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Short-interest amplified reversals: large short interest + down spike -> mean-revert
results.description: Combines news_short_interest and news_pct_30min. S1 applied. S3: short_interest coverage 0.872 good. S4: short_interest lower userCount but meaningful. Confidence moderate. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Post-news range breakout: large session_range_pct implies continuation
results.description: Uses news_session_range_pct (coverage 0.268) — low coverage so applied ts_backfill per S3. S1 used single field. S2 N/A. S4: userCount moderate. Keep operators minimal. Confidence lower due to backfill. Confidence: 0.48

results.idea: EOD reversal: when EODHigh far above TONLast (highexcstddev)
results.description: Uses news_high_exc_stddev (high coverage) to target reversals from intraday spikes. S1 applied. S3: not needed. S4: moderate user/alpha counts. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Momentum among high-news-volume names (normalize by mov_vol)
results.description: Uses news_curr_vol and news_mov_vol to weight news_pct_30min momentum. S1: three-field idea but implemented with two fields plus operator (keeps <=2 datafields). S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: mov_vol high userCount. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Persisting surprise: compare EPS vs PE normalized move
results.description: Uses news_eps_actual and news_pe_ratio to find earnings surprises validated by valuation. S1 applied. S3: coverages high. S4: both fields high user/alphaCount. Confidence: 0.7

results.idea: Microstructure fade: fast tick-heavy spikes revert
results.description: Uses news_tot_ticks and news_mins_1_chg (captures 1-min worst-case). S1: two fields. S3: both coverage >0.6. S2: treated mins_1 as scalar (no vec operator). S4: tot_ticks high userCount. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: After-hours reaction speed: prez first-minute vs 30min
results.description: Uses nws12_prez_1_minute and nws12_prez_30_min (pre/after-hours subset). S1 applied. S3: coverage varies but both >0.4; chosen because relevant to pre/post sessions. Did not backfill to preserve sessions. Confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Price discovery: TONLast vs EODClose momentum
results.description: Uses news_ton_last and news_eod_close to capture intra-day discovery direction. S1 applied (two fields). S3: both high coverage; S4: eod_close highly used. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Breakout confirmation when post_vwap moves with volume
results.description: Uses news_post_vwap and news_curr_vol. S1 applied. S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: post_vwap decent alphaCount. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Relative strength within news: normalize pct_30min cross-sectionally
results.description: Uses quantile on news_pct_30min to pick extremes across universe. S1 applied single field; S4: pct_30min high coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND limits respected. Confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Volatility normalized overnight gap continuation
results.description: Uses news_prev_day_ret (coverage 0.7311) and news_atr_ratio to scale gap. S1: two fields. S3: prev_day_ret >0.6 no backfill needed. S4: atr_ratio popular. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Provider-constrained signal: strong moves from reliable providers
results.description: Uses news_provider (index) and news_pct_10min. S1: two fields. S3: provider coverage high ~0.97. S4: provider userCount moderate. I bucket provider externally (not using GROUP). Kept implementation short. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Momentum fade in very high vol names (volstddev filter)
results.description: Uses news_pct_60min and news_vol_stddev to fade momentum in high-volatility names. S1 applied. S3 not needed. S4: vol_stddev well used. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Minute-count velocity: number of minutes to +1% as speed indicator
results.description: Uses news_mins_1l (coverage 0.707) representing speed to 1% up. S1 single field. S3: coverage ok so no backfill. Using inverse (fast -> strong move). Confidence: 0.5

results.idea: Tail-risk screener: extreme range relative to 30-day range
results.description: Uses news_range_stddev to pick abnormal ranges then reverse. S1 single field. S3: coverage 0.6172 close to threshold but >0.6 so no backfill. S4 moderate counts. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Continuation on large after-news high if ticks high
results.description: Combines news_max_up_ret and news_tot_ticks. S1: two fields. S3: both coverages high. S4: tot_ticks popular. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: After-news fade when max down amplitude high relative to ATR
results.description: Uses news_max_dn_ret and news_atr_ratio. S1 applied. S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: atr_ratio widely used. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Pre-market momentum: prez 5-min move continuation
results.description: Uses nws12_prez_5_min (pre-market 5-min) to capture continuation into session. S1 applied. S3: coverage ~0.3322 for some prez fields, but this specific is 0.3322 low so I prefer nws12_mainz_5_min (coverage 0.9601) — used mainz for reliability. S4: mainz fields high userCount. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Valuation-driven reversal: high PE + sharp up move -> short
results.description: Combines news_pe_ratio and news_pct_30min. S1 used. S3: both coverages high. S4: pe_ratio high userCount. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Trend-following across news sessions: sum of minute-bucket moves
results.description: Uses vec_sum over minute-change vector (news_mins_... family). S1: used multiple minute fields via vec_sum to aggregate. S2: applied vec_sum. S3: only use buckets with coverage>0.6; ts_backfill not needed. S4: minute buckets have variable userCounts; picked mainz_* set which is high coverage. Kept operators limited. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: EOD momentum persistence: compare TONLast->EOD change vs SPY
results.description: Uses news_indx_perf (already index-relative) to capture persistence. S1 single field. S3: coverage high. S4: good alphaCount. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Liquidity-conditioned mean-reversion: low mov_vol names revert faster
results.description: Uses news_mov_vol and news_pct_10min. S1 applied. S3: mov_vol coverage 0.8046. S4: mov_vol high userCount. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Opening auction inefficiency: main_vwap vs open price
results.description: Uses news_main_vwap and news_open to capture initial auction mispricing. S1 applied. S3: both coverages >0.7. S4: main_vwap moderate userCount. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Relative post-news move vs previous close (momentum)
results.description: Uses news_prevclose (coverage 0.1728 low) so applied ts_backfill per S3. Combined with news_pct_30min. S1: two fields. S4: prevclose low userCount but needed to compute return. Confidence: 0.5

results.idea: Micro-momentum weighted by provider reliability
results.description: Uses news_pct_1min and news_provider. S1 applied. S3: provider coverage high so no backfill. S4: provider userCount moderate; used as a multiplier. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Earnings gap capture: open gap scaled by market cap
results.description: Uses news_open_gap and news_cap (large user/alphaCount). S1 applied. S3: both coverage >0.6. S4: cap high userCount. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low short interest
results.description: Uses news_short_interest and news_pct_30min to prefer momentum where short interest low (less short-squeeze). S1 applied. S3: coverage high. S4: short_interest moderate. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: 30-min continuation only when ticks exceed historical mean
results.description: Uses news_tot_ticks and news_pct_30min. S1 applied. S3: both high coverage. S4: tot_ticks high userCount. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Fade large intraday moves after 90 minutes
results.description: Uses news_pct_90min to target reversion. S1 single field. S3: coverage 0.9692 high. S4: moderate userCount. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Persistent winners: sum of pcts over first hour
results.description: Uses ts_sum over news_pct_1min series approximated by news_pct_1min and news_pct_5_min aggregate. S1: used two summary fields to approximate short-series sum. S3: coverages high. S4: fields popular. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: After-news volatility collapse -> continuation
results.description: Uses news_vol_stddev and news_pct_120min to detect volatility collapse then trend. S1 applied. S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: vol_stddev good user/alphaCount. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Capturing momentum in stocks with low pre-news activity

results.idea: Rapid upper-tail continuation: mins_to_10pct_up short -> long
results.description: Uses news_mins_10_pct_up (coverage 0.6282) to find rapid up moves. S1 single field. S3: coverage >0.6 so no backfill. S4: good userCount. Confidence: 0.53

results.description: Uses news_pct_30min and news_spy_close (both high coverage) to prefer trades aligned with market. S1: two fields. S3: not needed. S4: spy fields reliable. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Fade extreme minute spikes measured by 30s and 1min both high
results.description: Uses news_pct_30sec and news_pct_1min to detect ultra-short extremes and fade if both extreme. S1: two fields. S3: both coverages high. S4: moderate userCounts. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Directional conviction when both pre- and post-news move align
results.description: Uses news_prev_day_ret and news_pct_30min. S1 applied two fields. S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: prev_day_ret moderate userCount. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: High PE stock continuing down -> stronger short
results.description: Uses news_pe_ratio and news_pct_30min focusing on negative moves. S1 applied. S3: coverages high. S4: pe_ratio high userCount. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: After-news VWAP divergence persistence
results.description: Uses news_eod_vwap and news_ton_last to detect price drifting from VWAP. S1 applied. S3: both high coverage. S4: eod_vwap good alphaCount. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Strength in low-cap names after positive news
results.description: Uses news_cap and news_pct_30min, favoring small cap continuation after positive news. S1 applied. S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: cap has very high userCount. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Spike-unwind when rangestddev and maxup both extreme
results.description: Uses news_range_stddev and news_max_up_ret to identify large range spikes to fade. S1 applied. S3: range_stddev ~0.6172 >0.6 no backfill. S4: both moderate counts. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Momentum in names with rising tick counts
results.description: Uses news_tot_ticks and ts_sum over ticks (ts_sum over 30 days using ts_sum). S1: used single field with ts_sum operator to capture trend. S3: coverage high. S4: tot_ticks popular. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Short-latency arbitrage: post-news 30-sec vs 1-min mismatch
results.description: Uses news_pct_30sec and news_pct_1min to detect intraminute divergence. S1 applied. S3: both coverages high. S4: moderate userCount. Confidence: 0.51

results.idea: Directional bias if post-news VWAP moves beyond ATR
results.description: Uses news_eod_vwap and news_atr_ratio to confirm directional strength. S1 applied. S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: atr_ratio high userCount. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low session_range_pct (stable sessions)
results.description: Uses news_session_range_pct (coverage 0.268 low) — applied ts_backfill per S3 and news_pct_30min. S1 two fields. S4: session_range_pct low userCount; backfilled to use. Confidence: 0.45

results.idea: Post-earnings drift: 120-min return continuation for EPS surprises
results.description: Uses news_eps_actual and news_pct_120min. S1 applied. S3: both coverages high. S4: eps_actual high alphaCount. Confidence: 0.72

results.idea: Reversion after large post-news bid/ask activity proxied by tot_ticks

results.idea: Directional continuation when both curr_vol and open_vol high

results.idea: Mean-revert intraday when pre-vwap deviates but low volume

results.idea: Aggregate minute-bucket average speed filter

results.idea: Large-cap momentum persistence vs small-cap reversal
results.description: Uses news_cap and news_pct_30min to separate cap-deciles. S1 applied two fields. S3: coverage high. S4: cap very high userCount. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Continuation when TONLast near session high (ton_high)
results.description: Uses news_ton_high and news_pct_30min. S1 applied. S3: high coverage. S4: ton_high moderate counts. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Fade when after-news spike exceeds 30-day sd of range

results.idea: Momentum in names with low short interest increasing

results.idea: Overreaction fade using max_up_amt normalized by cap
results.description: Uses news_max_upamt and news_cap. S1 two fields. S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: cap high userCount. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Post-news 120-min trend strength measured by IR
results.description: Uses ts_ir on news_pct_120min to measure information ratio and trade on high IR. S1 single field using ts_ir. S3: coverage high. S4 moderate userCount. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Opening gap continuation only for low PE names
results.description: Uses news_open_gap and news_pe_ratio; favors low PE continuation. S1 applied. S3: coverages high. S4: pe_ratio popular. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Momentum scaled by minutes to 3% up as speed-adjusted factor
results.description: Uses news_mins_3chg (coverage 0.9174) as speed indicator with news_pct_10min. S1 two fields. S3: no backfill. S4: mins_3_chg decent userCount. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Post-news carry: small immediate move but persistent drift over 120min
results.description: Uses news_pct_10min and news_pct_120min to favor slow drifts. S1 applied two fields. S3: coverages high. S4: fields commonly used. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Fade when main vwap diverges from post vwap significantly
results.description: Uses news_main_vwap and news_post_vwap (post_vwap coverage 0.9705). S1 two fields. S3: both high coverage. S4: vwap fields moderate userCounts. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Speed-of-move momentum: short minute-to-minute avg
results.description: Uses vec_avg over mainz minute pct buckets to get speed; S2 applied vec_avg; chose high-coverage mainz. S3: mainz coverage high; S4: mainz userCount strong. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Continuations when close_vol spikes relative to average
results.description: Uses news_close_vol and news_mov_vol to detect anomalous close volume supporting continuation. S1 two fields. S3: close_vol coverage 0.6909 >0.6. S4: close_vol moderate userCount. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Fast reversal on 4-minute extreme move
results.description: Uses news_mins_4_pct_up and news_mins_4_pct_dn (both coverage high). S1 applied. S2 not used. S3 not needed. Confidence moderate. Confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Directional filter using SPY recent change to avoid market noise
results.description: Uses news_spy_last and news_pct_30min to align with market; S1 two fields. S3: spy fields high coverage. S4: spy userCounts moderate. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Fade after earnings when range_stddev extreme

results.idea: Continuation when EOD close above TONLast and high ticks
results.description: Uses news_eod_close and news_tot_ticks. S1 two fields. S3: coverages high. S4: eod_close high userCount. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Directional trade only when post_vwap and eod_vwap align
results.description: Uses news_post_vwap and news_eod_vwap; long when both above TONLast. S1 two fields. S3: both high coverage. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Fade on rapid 2-minute spikes exceeding 3-min historical rank

results.idea: Fade large immediate up moves in low-liquidity names
results.description: Uses news_pct_1min and news_mov_vol; favors fade when mov_vol low. S1 two fields. S3: mov_vol coverage high. S4: mov_vol strong userCount. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Earnings-day drift: compare TONLast->EOD move vs 30-day avg

results.idea: Short-term reversal flagged by extreme low_exc_stddev
results.description: Uses news_low_exc_stddev; extreme low excursion suggests overshoot -> revert. S1 single field. S3: coverage high. S4 moderate userCount. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: After-hours surprise continuation for names with high prevday movement
results.description: Uses nws12_prez_prevday and nws12_prez_30_min: S1 two fields. S3: prez coverage variable but prevday/prez mainz have good coverage; used mainz where possible. S4: mainz fields have good counts. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Microstructure filter: prefer signals when allvwap aligns with eod_vwap
results.description: Uses nws12_allz_allvwap and news_eod_vwap (both high coverage) to confirm robust moves. S1 two fields. S3: no backfill. S4: allvwap userCount moderate. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Momentum only if after-news max_up_ret exceeds ATR ratio
results.description: Uses news_max_up_ret and news_atr_ratio. S1 two fields. S3: both coverages >0.6. S4: atr_ratio popular. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Slow drift capture: trade when 120-min zscore consistent for 3 days
results.description: Uses ts_zscore(news_pct_120min,120) and ts_delay to check persistence: S1 single field with ts_zscore and ts_delay. S3: high coverage. S4 moderate. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Fade first 10-minute move if closing volume not supporting (low close_vol)
results.description: Uses news_pct_10min and news_close_vol; S1 two fields. S3: close_vol coverage >0.6. S4: close_vol moderate. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Earnings post-day reversal when maxdown extreme
results.description: Uses news_max_dn_ret and news_eps_actual; large down moves despite EPS imply oversell. S1 two fields. S3: coverages high. S4: eps_actual popular. Confidence: 0.61
